column1: Funeral services will be held on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 10:00 a.m. at Leikness Funeral Home in Wautoma with Rev. Ben Sheets of Good Shepherd Lutheran Church in Plover
column4: WI officiating. Burial will be in Wautoma Union Cemetery. Visitation will be held on Tuesday from 9:00 a.m. until the time of services. A Memorial has been established for Peace Lutheran Church
